titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 70th anniversary of the Idaho Potato Commission and designating May 2007 as "Idaho Potato Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
5/1/2007--Introduced.
Recognizes the 70th anniversary of the Idaho Potato Commission. Designates May 2007 as Idaho Potato Month.
